completions.text:
to you, my dear. I hope you are well. I am writing to you from the home of my dear friend, Mr. and Mrs. John and Mary Smith. They are very kind to me, and I am enjoying their hospitality. I am also enjoying the company of their daughter, Miss Mary Smith. She is a lovely young lady, and I am very fond of her. I hope you will enjoy your stay here as well. I look forward to hearing from you soon. Yours truly, Jane Austen
